name: Space Fighter X
description:
This is my 2D Shooter project for the Game Design and Development Course.


Modifications: 

  1. Created more levels including a Tutorial, Boss level, and Endless Mode for score chasers.
  2. Created Mission Briefing scenes to give the player some backstory.
  3. Modified the Main Menu to look a lot more in theme with the game as well as much more pleasing to look at.
  4. Created fully working power-ups with assets that I photoshopped myself. 
  5. Created new UI elements such as a Boss Health Bar
  6. Created a Boss Enemy

Modifications (Not significant):

  1. Any additional sound effects or music was not created by myself, it was taken from freesound.org. This does not count as significant as it is not mine and just added for a better atmosphere and player experience. 

Credits:

Made by Michael Kaganovich

Notable Mentions:

This being my first project ever, the biggest hurdle was coding. Most of the project time could be appropriated to watching coding tutorials on Youtube. I just wanted to give a mention to Brackeys and Code Monkey whose videos really helped me incorporate code and make my game more fun.
Note - I did not copy their code one to one. I used their videos as tutorials but modified the game code myself as most of their code needed modifications to be compatible with the already existing scripts provided for the project.
